Text:
The other mkv torrent on this tracker says it has 2 channel audio, 128 kB/s.
Don't believe it, look on imdb and you'll see it is mono(1 channel).
Also the original is 192 KB/s not 128 KB/s as the other torrent.

Apropo anamorphic 2.35:1, you can watch it either default like this:

http://j.imagehost.org/0571/1_33.jpg

or stretched to window(full screen) like this:

http://j.imagehost.org/0691/2_5.jpg

Nothing was cropped from the picture, you can set the AR on your player and TV as you like.
If you want too check who is right take this torrent : https://thepiratebay.org/torrent/5290852/Soylent_Green%5Bx264%5D%5BMP3%5D.4Multi_Audio_-19Multi_Sub.mkv
Mkvonly! Stop spamming mine torrent with yours stupid comments!

you spam my torrent with your link, I never link my torrents to other's torrents.

I didn't leave stupid comment, I only said that this movie was made in mono and all dvd-s on the net & acording to imdb, including my source(and yours too mostlikely) are mono but your rip is of course stereo. That is weird!

 I wasn't spamming, I just wondered about the audio track.
 I even said that I downloaded some of your torrents and they were cool. 
 Why didn't you call zmacdaddy8's comment stupid (and rude) instead you say it about my comment. What I said was a fact.
 At least you could have said that the dvd had indeed mono sound but you converted it to a "fake stereo" with Audacity or something, I don't know, I never did it before.
